tool_description: ScrapeMaster is a Web Scraping  API that helps you to scrap data from any website, you can:           - Get all page data.          - Get data by "tag"          - Get data by "class"          - Get data by "id"          - Get data by "research a specific word/string" in the tag's text         - Get data by "research a specific part of attribute" in the tag             selector  This API helps you to scrap complex and specific data.
name: ScrapeMaster
title: ScrapeMaster

api_list.name: Get data by “research a specific part of attribute” in the tag selector
api_list.description: Get data by “research a specific part of attribute” in the tag selector

api_list.name: Get data by “research a specific word/string” in the tag’s text
api_list.description: Get data by “research a specific word/string” in the tag’s text

api_list.name: Get data by "id"
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all data from a specific tag and its id.

api_list.name: Get data by "class"
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all data from a specific tag and its class attribute.

api_list.name: Get data by “tag”
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all data from a specific tag.

api_list.name: Get all page's content
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the page's content from the URL given by the user.
